metadata.name: Nightmare on Dallas Street
metadata.description:
It’s starting to get dark and windy outside. Gary, Indiana is having its coldest fall in years, but that won’t stop the trick - or - treating tonight. The kids are terrified of the dark brown old house at the end of the street, but their sweet tooth is sadly guiding their intuitions. The kids walk up to the door and knock, but nobody comes to open up. They wait a few minutes then turn around and decide to leave. As they begin to walk away .. the door opens ..

Artwork done with acrylic paint & oil pen on canvas. Based on the “Scary Garys” and “Gary Ghosts” digital collectibles, , and celebrating the Scary Garys 1 year anniversary.
